title: In-Game Client always starts Windowed
body:
Hi,

I have been playing for 5 years and never had this problem. In the last week, every time I load into a game my client will be in 1024x768 Windowed mode on Very Low Graphics. (I have a super PC and can run everything at Max and have been doing so for years). 

I change the settings and it takes a few seconds and then the game is playable. This has become incredibly annoying to do every game, especially if I want to get out of spawn early to invade or watch for an invade.


What I have tried:
- changing settings and restarting the client
- going into a custom to change settings and restarting the client
- uninstalling League entirely (guessing I missed a setting file somewhere)


Please help!

replies.body:
Your in-game settings are tied to a file that is saved server-side. It's possible that if we complete a reset of that file, it could resolve this issue. I recommend following the steps below:

First, **log into League** then navigate to your install directory:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete the folder called **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted this folder, close League out, then log back into League. Create a custom match and confirm that everything has been reset to default and that you load in as expected. If this worked, be sure to make any hotkey and game/sound settings you normally play with, as this reset also set every setting back to default. Let me know if this worked!
This worked for me, thank you so much!!
